caption.title: Plots of the empirical covariance values (red circles) and fitted theoretical models (multi-color surface or blue line in 3D, and 2D plots, respectively) of the log-transformed HFRS incidences (county level) for each incidence class, i.e., (a) for class 1, (b) for class 2, (c) for class 3 and (d) for class 4.
